verbs.description: [ARG0: havana] [V: fights] [ARG1: trash problem] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of 500th anniversary] luxury hotels are rising fast along the prado the tree - lined colonial boulevard that is home to many of havana best - known architectural masterworks yet within sight of five - star lodgings charging 500 a night stray cats and flies swarm mountains of uncollected trash piles reeking of rotting waste spill out of dumpsters and climb waist - high as garbage trucks fail to appear for days and even weeks one of the most basic functions of city government cuba andrea rodríguez u s boylan cuban government japan rosario aneas rodrigo malmierca latin america old havana havana luis alberto martinez daysi boza habaneros centro havana cerro twitter victor leon
